properties.areaDesc: Moniteau; Pike; Pike; Cole; Audrain; Boone; Ralls; Callaway; Osage; Montgomery
properties.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued January 9 at 3:12AM CST until January 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
The Flash Flood Watch is now in effect for

* portions of west central Illinois and Missouri...including the
following counties...in west central Illinois...Pike IL. In
Missouri...Audrain MO...Boone MO...Callaway MO...Cole MO...
Moniteau MO...Montgomery MO...Osage MO...Pike MO and Ralls MO.

* From Friday morning through late Friday night

* Widespread heavy rainfall of 2-3 inches.

* Heavy rainfall will result in flooding of low lying or poor
drainage areas...and ultimately dangerous flash flooding on
smaller creeks and streams. Significant rises on larger
streams and rivers will also be possible.
properties.instruction:
A Flash Flood Watch is advanced notice that conditions are
favorable that may lead to flash flooding. People in the Watch
area, especially in flood prone areas, should use this time to
make preparations just in case. Stay informed, and be ready for
quick action if flooding is observed or if a Flash Flood Warning
is issued.

NWSheadline: FLASH FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT
